events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because it is not what I ordered.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning refund and wrong item.
An agent from the refund department has been assigned to handle the customer's case for faster resolution.
Hello! Sorry to hear you received the wrong item. Iâ€™m here to help get this sorted out for you.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. Attached is a picture of the item I got, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund and send you a prepaid label to return the wrong item.
Thanks for handling this quickly! The refund process sounds good to me and I appreciate the help.
We have processed your refund and sent the return label to your email. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just following up to confirm that you received your refund and the return label, and if everything is satisfactory now.
Since we have not heard otherwise, we will now close this case. Thank you for your patience and have a great day!
